resources.string: Welcome to The Booky! Your personal appointment booking app for your local businesses. Businesses also use this application to view and manage their appointments made in the app

The application is very easy to use, just follow the navigation bar and it should be self-explanatory, once you open up the application after this, it will automatically take you into your personal appointments page every time. This page is your hub for personal appointments made and adding or removing your appointments. You can either hit the book appointment button on your personal page or hit the middle navigation button that also takes you to the booking section, where it will give you a list of Businesses that have signed up and are ready to take your appointment! Once you\'ve selected a business, it will take to the booking UI, which lets you input the needed information for you to book your appointment!

For Businesses looking to join in and take appointments its fast and easy! Just head over to the last navigation tab to access the business needs page. Here you will be able to add your business easily using the Add Your Business UI, which allows you to enter your business information and setup user credentials. Once you have successfully setup your business you can click on the view appointments button and enter your credentials to view your appointment page, where you can view and remove appointments when necessary, and also sort them by date or name using the sort buttons! If you want to see how it should look, enter this example credential, Username: Gigi1029 and Passcode: 12345678 and test it out!
